headline: How we dodged the Worlds Most Dumbest Human Being from becoming a Dictator of U.S.
sentences: I almost wasnt going to write about this but I got inspired by what the Transphobic Criminal Douche said about him taking a cognitive test to prove to us that he allegedly wasnt stupid and is just a special transphobic criminal Douche who managed to fall upwards instead downwards like the average criminal does after committed a encyclopedia set worth of crimes.
I cant believe he said that he wasnt stupid with a straight face and I am amazed that he said that at one of his hate rallies in Delaware Ohio while promoting another phony J.D.
What the Orange Dumbass was referring to when he said Cognitive Test was actually the test for dementia and acing it is something he shouldnt brag about.
I decided to show Kitties here instead of the rage and vomit inducing picture of the Transphobic Criminal Douche.
The moral of the story here is whatever the Transphobic Criminal Douche says is 100 percent a complete lie.
Halfway through I expected someone to stand up and said Your tweets and actions prove otherwise?.
I just about laughed so hard that I cried tears of laughter.
When he said that we cant call him stupid anymore.
